# SuperTK

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

SuperTK is a set of packages.

## Installation

You can install the development version of SuperTK from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("NChanard/SuperTK")
```
